features: VIBRANT, BLENDABLE COLOR: The e.l.f. Monochromatic Multi Stick is a cream-to-powder, wear-everywhere stick that delivers a highly blendable kiss of color.
FOR EYES, LIPS & CHEEKS: This versatile, multi-use stick works overtime as an eyeshadow, lipstick, and blush, delivering a gorgeous hint of color wherever you want it.
SMOOTH FINISH: The non-greasy, lightweight & nourishing formula glides on and blends seamlessly, melting into your skin for a fresh and flattering finish.
NOURISHES & REFRESHES SKIN: Infused with Shea Butter to nourish skin for a smooth finish while Vitamin E brings a refreshing moisture boost.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan.
body.description: What it is: A cream-to-powder, wear-everywhere blush stick stick that delivers a highly blendable kiss of color to eyes, lips and cheeks.Why we love:Versatile, multi stick makeup for eyes, lips, and cheeksNon-greasy, lightweight formula in a trending stick blush formatFoolproof, blendable wearPerfect size for touch-ups on the goKey Ingredients:Shea Butter - Nourishes skin for a smooth finishVitamin E - Brings a refreshing moisture boostOne multi-use makeup stick, all the versatility. This cream blush stick also works overtime as an eyeshadow and lipstick as well, delivering a gorgeous hint of color wherever you want it. The nourishing formula glides on and blends seamlessly, melting into your skin for a fresh and flattering finish.All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and leaping bunny certified. Because kindness is chic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great blush for many reasons!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the colors Glistening Peach and Sparkling Rose, and they both give me a beautiful natural look! I prefer the sparkling rose, only becausw it is darker, and shows up more, but if you want a nice, natural, and healthy look, I would reccomend to go for Glistening peach! I love these because they are mini and bite-sized, and can be fit into a bag, and I love bringing it with me. I would not specifically say the blending it effortlessly, but it is not imposdible to blend. You just have to swipe a little bit on, and grab a big blush brush and blend it in. For people with dry skin, I would MUCH reccomend this over the powder blush. It makes less of a mess, and it does not dry out your skin like powder blushes can. I also love the shimmer it gives off. I glow on stage when I perform, and I don’t get that with other blushes. The shade assortment may seem small, but I think they give great color choices for different skin tones. I always like smaller assortments of shades because larger to huge assortments can get overwhelming to the point when you don’t know what shades even fit your tone. I would probably reccomend using these for blush only, but they are okay for eyeshadow and lipstick. But when you use it as lipstick, you have to be careful because the stick is a little too large, so you have got to be careful so you don’t get it out of the lip line. Using it as eyeshadow however gives off a super similar feeling as creme shadow. It just depends what you prefer, but if you prefer powder eyeshadow, just use that, but if you prefer using a cream, I would recommend using this as an eyeshadow. Out of the two shades I purchased, I would reccomend using glistening peach for the eyes, and sparkling rose for the lips, but that is my personal opinion. If you prefer a bold eye and a more subtle lip, then I would recommend doing it the other way around or to purchase a darker color for the eyes. Overall, I would definitely reccomend using this, especially for blush, and I would like to order the rest of the collection to test out the colors and how they look on the eyes/lips/face. I would definitely reccomend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and moist.
reviews.reviewText: I use very, very expensive skin care products on my face. I tried a few different colors of elf blush lip and eye! They are pretty and light moist, and for a woman, my age to not go into creases. I also use some Trinny London much more expensive. All the other skincare products that I do use are from my doctor. I would say on a pinch especially if you’re going on vacation try the elf even if you’re not on vacation it’s a fun make up I just wish that they would have more colors. They only have a few. They’re OK for the lips but I do use a different lipstick. Sometimes they put a little bit of the glow on for a shine but other than that I use my Other lipsticks that I own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile Touch of Color with Room for Improvement
reviews.reviewText: The e.l.f. Monochromatic Multi Stick in Dazzling Peony offers a convenient and versatile approach to adding color to eyes, lips, and cheeks. While its creamy and blendable texture is commendable, the overall performance leaves a bit more to be desired in terms of longevity and intensity.One of the notable positives of this multi stick is its luxuriously creamy consistency. Upon application, it glides smoothly onto the skin, making it easy to blend for a seamless and natural finish. The Dazzling Peony shade adds a soft, rosy hue that is universally flattering and suitable for various skin tones.The multipurpose aspect of this stick is appealing, allowing for quick and effortless application on different areas of the face. It's a handy tool for creating a cohesive and harmonious makeup look with minimal effort.However, the staying power of the color is where this multi stick falls a bit short. While the initial application is vibrant and fresh, the intensity tends to fade over time. Reapplication may be necessary for those looking to maintain a bold and noticeable color throughout the day.Additionally, the product's performance on the lips is adequate but may not meet the expectations of those seeking a long-lasting lip color. It imparts a subtle tint, but the need for frequent touch-ups may be a drawback for those with a preference for more enduring lip products.The packaging is sleek and travel-friendly, with a twist-up design that eliminates the need for sharpening. This adds to the convenience of on-the-go application but doesn't entirely compensate for the need for more prolonged color retention.In conclusion, the e.l.f. Monochromatic Multi Stick in Dazzling Peony is a decent addition to a makeup routine for its creamy texture and versatility. However, those desiring a longer-lasting and more intense color payoff may find themselves wanting more. While it offers a quick and easy solution for a touch of color, improvements in staying power would elevate its appeal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Lot Of Bang For Your Buck !!!
reviews.reviewText: I have always heard good things about this brand, so I finally decided to try it ! Can't believe the price ! It is worth so much more than what you pay ! I love how it can be used for lips, cheeks, eyes ! Makes for a more uniform look - everything matches. I don't especially care to wear make up, but this product adds just a hint of color - makes me look pretty and alert - but looks natural, like I am not wearing anything at all. It fits in my pocket too ! Easy to bring along. I also appreciate the color chart on Amazon - shows all the colors on different skin tones, so my color decision was quite easy. I plan to get 1 or 2 more colors now, a little darker, or maybe more bronze for spring/summer. Thank you !
I like this to use as a blush and a coloured lip gloss. Very happy with it.
Tiene buena pigmentación, se difumina muy bien aunque no me dura mucho pero deja un acabado bello.

reviews.reviewText: Love this, I have mature skin and this gives me such a beautiful glow, soft and natural, easy to blend, doesn't cause any break outs, have had many compliments , great price, highly recommend
